trans-unit.source: Release notes for Application Insights for Windows
trans-unit.target: Release notes for Application Insights for Windows

trans-unit.source: The latest updates.
trans-unit.target: The latest updates.

trans-unit.source: Release Notes for Application Insights SDK for Windows Phone and Store
trans-unit.target: Release Notes for Application Insights SDK for Windows Phone and Store

trans-unit.source: The [Application Insights SDK](app-insights-windows-get-started.md) sends telemetry about your live app to [Application Insights](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/), where you can analyze its usage and performance.
trans-unit.target: The [Application Insights SDK](app-insights-windows-get-started.md) sends telemetry about your live app to [Application Insights](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/), where you can analyze its usage and performance.

trans-unit.source: To install the SDK in your application
trans-unit.target: To install the SDK in your application

trans-unit.source: See [Get started with Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps](app-insights-windows-get-started.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Get started with Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps](app-insights-windows-get-started.md).

trans-unit.source: To upgrade to the latest SDK
trans-unit.target: To upgrade to the latest SDK

trans-unit.source: Take a copy of ApplicationInsights.config, to keep any customizations you have done.
trans-unit.target: Take a copy of ApplicationInsights.config, to keep any customizations you have done.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, right-click your project and choose **Manage NuGet packages**.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, right-click your project and choose **Manage NuGet packages**.

trans-unit.source: Set the filter to show installed packages.
trans-unit.target: Set the filter to show installed packages.

trans-unit.source: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose Upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose Upgrade.

trans-unit.source: Compare the old and new versions of ApplicationInsights.config.
trans-unit.target: Compare the old and new versions of ApplicationInsights.config.

trans-unit.source: Merge back any customizations you made to the old version.
trans-unit.target: Merge back any customizations you made to the old version.

trans-unit.source: Rebuild your solution.
trans-unit.target: Rebuild your solution.

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0.0
trans-unit.target: Version 1.0.0

trans-unit.source: Windows App SDK
trans-unit.target: Windows App SDK

trans-unit.source: New initialization for Windows Apps.
trans-unit.target: New initialization for Windows Apps.

trans-unit.source: New `WindowsAppInitializer` class with `InitializeAsync()` method allows for bootstrapping initialization of SDK collection.
trans-unit.target: New `WindowsAppInitializer` class with `InitializeAsync()` method allows for bootstrapping initialization of SDK collection.

trans-unit.source: This change allow more precise control and significant app initialization performance improvements over previous ApplicationInsights.config technique.
trans-unit.target: This change allow more precise control and significant app initialization performance improvements over previous ApplicationInsights.config technique.

trans-unit.source: DeveloperMode is no longer automatically set.
trans-unit.target: DeveloperMode is no longer automatically set.

trans-unit.source: To change DeveloperMode behavior you must specify in code.
trans-unit.target: To change DeveloperMode behavior you must specify in code.

trans-unit.source: NuGet package no longer injects ApplicationInsights.config.
trans-unit.target: NuGet package no longer injects ApplicationInsights.config.

trans-unit.source: Recommend to use the new WindowsAppInitializer when manually adding NuGet package.
trans-unit.target: Recommend to use the new WindowsAppInitializer when manually adding NuGet package.

trans-unit.source: ApplicationInsights.config only reads `<InstrumentationKey>`, all other settings are ignored in preference for WindowsAppInitializer settings.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationInsights.config only reads `<InstrumentationKey>`, all other settings are ignored in preference for WindowsAppInitializer settings.

trans-unit.source: Store Market will be auto collected by SDK.
trans-unit.target: Store Market will be auto collected by SDK.

trans-unit.source: Lots of bug fixes, stability improvements, and performance enhancements.
trans-unit.target: Lots of bug fixes, stability improvements, and performance enhancements.

trans-unit.source: Core SDK
trans-unit.target: Core SDK

trans-unit.source: ApplicationInsights.config file is no longer requiered.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationInsights.config file is no longer requiered.

trans-unit.source: And not added by the NuGet package.
trans-unit.target: And not added by the NuGet package.

trans-unit.source: Configuration can be fully specified in code.
trans-unit.target: Configuration can be fully specified in code.

trans-unit.source: NuGet package will no longer add a targets file to your solution.
trans-unit.target: NuGet package will no longer add a targets file to your solution.

trans-unit.source: This removes the automatic setting of DeveloperMode during a debug build.
trans-unit.target: This removes the automatic setting of DeveloperMode during a debug build.

trans-unit.source: DeveloperMode should be manually set in code.
trans-unit.target: DeveloperMode should be manually set in code.

trans-unit.source: Version 0.17
trans-unit.target: Version 0.17

trans-unit.source: Windows App SDK
trans-unit.target: Windows App SDK

trans-unit.source: Windows App SDK now supports Universal Windows Apps created against Windows 10 technical preview and with VS 2015 RC.
trans-unit.target: Windows App SDK now supports Universal Windows Apps created against Windows 10 technical preview and with VS 2015 RC.

trans-unit.source: Core SDK
trans-unit.target: Core SDK

trans-unit.source: TelemetryClient defaults to initialize with the InMemoryChannel.
trans-unit.target: TelemetryClient defaults to initialize with the InMemoryChannel.

trans-unit.source: New API added, `TelemetryClient.Flush()`.
trans-unit.target: New API added, `TelemetryClient.Flush()`.

trans-unit.source: This Flush method will trigger an immediate blocking upload of all telemetry logged to that client.
trans-unit.target: This Flush method will trigger an immediate blocking upload of all telemetry logged to that client.

trans-unit.source: This enables manual triggering of upload before process shutdown.
trans-unit.target: This enables manual triggering of upload before process shutdown.

trans-unit.source: NuGet package added a .Net 4.5 target.
trans-unit.target: NuGet package added a .Net 4.5 target.

trans-unit.source: This target has no external dependencies (removed BCL and EventSource dependencies).
trans-unit.target: This target has no external dependencies (removed BCL and EventSource dependencies).

trans-unit.source: Version 0.16
trans-unit.target: Version 0.16

trans-unit.source: 2015-04-28 preview
trans-unit.target: 2015-04-28 preview

trans-unit.source: SDK now supports DNX target platform to enable monitoring of [.NET Core framework](http://www.dotnetfoundation.org/NETCore5) applications.
trans-unit.target: SDK now supports DNX target platform to enable monitoring of [.NET Core framework](http://www.dotnetfoundation.org/NETCore5) applications.

trans-unit.source: Instances of ```TelemetryClient``` do not cache Instrumentation Key anymore.
trans-unit.target: Instances of ```TelemetryClient``` do not cache Instrumentation Key anymore.

trans-unit.source: Now if instrumentation key wasn't set in ```TelemetryClient``` explicitly ```InstrumentationKey``` will return null.
trans-unit.target: Now if instrumentation key wasn't set in ```TelemetryClient``` explicitly ```InstrumentationKey``` will return null.

trans-unit.source: It fixes an issue when you set ```TelemetryConfiguration.Active.InstrumentationKey``` after some telemetry was already collected, telemetry modules like dependency collector, web requests data collection and performance counters collector will use new instrumentation key.
trans-unit.target: It fixes an issue when you set ```TelemetryConfiguration.Active.InstrumentationKey``` after some telemetry was already collected, telemetry modules like dependency collector, web requests data collection and performance counters collector will use new instrumentation key.

trans-unit.source: Version 0.15
trans-unit.target: Version 0.15

trans-unit.source: New property ```Operation.SyntheticSource``` now available on ```TelemetryContext```.
trans-unit.target: New property ```Operation.SyntheticSource``` now available on ```TelemetryContext```.

trans-unit.source: Now you can mark your telemetry items as "not a real user traffic" and specify how this traffic was generated.
trans-unit.target: Now you can mark your telemetry items as "not a real user traffic" and specify how this traffic was generated.

trans-unit.source: As an example by setting this property you can distinguish traffic from your test automation from load test traffic.
trans-unit.target: As an example by setting this property you can distinguish traffic from your test automation from load test traffic.

trans-unit.source: Channel logic was moved to the separate NuGet called Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.PersistenceChannel.
trans-unit.target: Channel logic was moved to the separate NuGet called Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.PersistenceChannel.

trans-unit.source: Default channel is now called InMemoryChannel
trans-unit.target: Default channel is now called InMemoryChannel

trans-unit.source: New method ```TelemetryClient.Flush``` allows to flush telemetry items from the buffer synchronously
trans-unit.target: New method ```TelemetryClient.Flush``` allows to flush telemetry items from the buffer synchronously

trans-unit.source: Version 0.13
trans-unit.target: Version 0.13

trans-unit.source: No release notes for older versions available.
trans-unit.target: No release notes for older versions available.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
